news_title: Binance Alpha News: DOYR's 5,891% Surge Defies Market-Wide Fear
news_subtitle: The crypto market slid deeper into Fear this week, with the CMC Fear & Greed Index dropping to 29 as Bitcoin dominance held at 58.9%. Total market cap fell 0.51% to $3.15 trillion, while trading volume declined 0.68% to $196.11 billion. Against this backdrop, Binance Alpha mainta...

news_title: Brazil's Largest Bank Itaú Tells Investors To Allocate Up To 3% In Bitcoin For 2026
news_subtitle: Itaú Unibanco recommends investors hold 1-3% in Bitcoin for 2026 to diversify portfolios and hedge currency risk amid volatility.

news_title: BitGo Nearing Federal Bank Status with OCC Approval
news_subtitle: BitGo obtains conditional OCC approval to become a national trust bank, enabling broader crypto services. Read original article on coincu.com

news_title: Ripple Payments Lands First European Bank With AMINA Partnership Under MiCA
news_subtitle: Ripple lands first European bank client with AMINA partnership for real-time cross-border payments under MiCA framework.

news_title: Brazilian Banking Giant Endorses Bitcoin as Portfolio Diversification Tool
news_subtitle: Brazil's largest bank advises investors to hold Bitcoin as portfolio diversification tool. Itaú Asset Management suggests 1-3% allocation based on low correlation data.
